sentences.en: 'set her back on the stabboard ! Ting - a - ling - ling!
sentences.cn: “ 右舷后退, 叮 —— 啊铃 —— 铃!

sentences.en: " Don't you have a class now? " I nod meaningfully to Ling, and we walk out together.
sentences.cn: 我向着凌吉士使眼色,我说: “ 这点钟有课 吧 ? ” 于是我送凌吉士出来.

sentences.en: But as they rise to leave, I ask them to convey my greetings to Ling.
sentences.cn: 不过在他俩走时, 我却又请他俩致意到凌吉士,说我问候他.

sentences.en: He is asking Yang Ling how to get there.
sentences.cn: 他正在问杨玲怎样到达那儿.

sentences.en: Hello, this is Wang Ming. May I speak to Gao Ling , please?
sentences.cn: 喂, 我是王明, 我可以和高玲通话 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ling has not been here for several days.
sentences.cn: 凌吉士居然已几日不来我这里了.

sentences.en: Ling promised to come and it's already nine o'clock.
sentences.cn: 凌吉士答应我来,而这时已晚上九点了.

sentences.en: Ling says to me:'sophia , you're a strange girl.
sentences.cn: 凌吉士向我说: “ 莎菲!

sentences.en: May I please speak to Ling Ling?
Mr Ling was acquitted of disorderly behaviour by magistrates.
sentences.cn: 地方法官宣判林先生扰乱治安罪名不成立。

sentences.en: The diminutive suffix - ling in " duckling " denotes affection.
sentences.cn: "duckling " (小鸭子)中意指"小"的字尾-ling表示亲昵.

sentences.en: There are three Lings: Tu Shao - ling , Wang Kuang - ling, and - do you know him?
sentences.cn: 三陵: 杜少陵, 王广陵 - - 知道这个人么?

sentences.en: When she was 75 years old, Ting Ling reentered to literary circle.
sentences.cn: 丁玲七十五岁时重返文坛.

sentences.en: Yang Ling: I live in a new house now.
sentences.cn: 杨玲: 我现在住在新房子里.

sentences.en: Yuan Shu sent 100 thousand troops , led by General Ji Ling, to attack Liu Bei.
sentences.cn: 袁绍之弟袁术派大将 纪灵 率领十万大军攻打刘备.

words.tran_cn: 鳕鱼；石南之一种；一种似雪鱼的食用鱼

trans.tran_en: any of several gadoid food fishes of the northern coastal genus Molva, esp M
